data.title: Governor’s Unified Cannabis Enforcement Taskforce Targets Environmental Harm in Largest Ever Operation to Eradicate Illegal Cannabis Grows in Siskiyou County
data.excerpt: Governor Gavin Newsom’s Unified Cannabis Enforcement Taskforce (UCETF) has continued its work to combat the illicit cannabis market, conducting an operation in Siskiyou County last month. The operation targeted illegal cannabis cultivation sites that threaten the environment, workers, and other members of the public. The sites in question were associated with suspected environmental violations, including […]
